title: A high performance eco-friendly MgAgSb-based thermoelectric power generation device near phase transition temperatures
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, 17,2879-2887
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE00019F, Paper
Xinzhi Wu, Yangjian Lin, Chengyan Liu, Yupeng Wang, Huan Li, Binghui Ge, Weishu Liu
The utilization of thermoelectric (TE) technology for eco-friendly energy harvesting presents a promising solution for off-grid power generation from waste heat.
